Articles.Content:
I have a decoupler stuck on my rover, which is really annoying. It is a base crawler thing... How can I remove it?

I have tried deleting it from the persistence.sfs file, but it just removes some panels off of my rover as well...

How do I delete it properly?

Create another rover that does not have the decoupler and launch it. Then compare the 2 rovers in the persistence.sfs to see exactly what the difference is, and what needs to be removed. Also, it's easy to just replace the location information of the vessel(by copying and pasting), making it probably easier to delete and replace the original vehicle rather than trying to delete individual parts. Or just use hyper-edit. Obligatory safety disclaimer : make backups of persistant.sfs before messing with it. It is possible to completely loose your game save if you mess it up.

Edited September 28, 2013 by Otis
